name: Garlic Roasted Chicken Breast
instruction: 1. Preheat oven to 500Â°F with rack in upper third.  2. Mince and mash garlic to a paste with 1/2 teaspoon salt, then transfer to a bowl. Stir in oregano, red-pepper flakes, oil, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and 1/2 teaspoon pepper.  3. Cut a 2-inch-long pocket (about 1 1/2 inches deep) horizontally in side of each breast half and spread 1/2 teaspoon garlic mixture into each pocket. Coat chicken with remaining garlic mixture.  4. Roast chicken, skin sides up, in a foil-lined large shallow baking pan until just cooked through, 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: Scant 1/2 teaspoon dried hot red-pepper flakes
4 chicken breast halves with skin and bone (2 to 2 1/4 lb total)

name: Scrambled Eggs
instruction: 1. Turn stove top to medium and put butter into pan  2. Crack open eggs into a bowl.  3. Whisk eggs inside of bowl until everything is mixed  4. Add eggs to frying pan and add salt and pepper to taste.  5. Let items cook for 2 - 3 mins and then add cheese.  6. Start moving edges of egg towards the center to create scrambled effect

name: Tuna Salad
instruction: 1. Combine 1 large pouch of tuna with 3 tbsp of mayonnaise and mix thoroughly.  2. Add favorite spices. Optionally, add diced pickles
